flawed_nl_solution:
25% of the apples are sour because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
The average price of an apple sold is $.4 because 0.75(0.5) + 0.25(0.1)= .4
He got 100 apples because 40 / 0.4 = <<40/0.4=1000>>1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100.0, not 1000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
